entry.title: Long COF...Again
entry.content:
Hey everyone!

If you’ve missed out on our long $COF posts from earlier this year, worry no more, as you have another opportunity now on an oversold pullback to get long again. Please observe the chart below:

With a pullback to the 20MA, $COF provides a great location for a long entry. Stop will be placed at 86.82, below the 50MA, giving us enough room for our trade to work accounting for the average noise of the stock.

If you’re interested in more ideas like this, follow us on Twitter or Facebook to receive our tweets and posts in real time! And if you haven’t yet, subscribe to our email listing below to receive special email alerts as well.

entry.title: Whooping $COF
entry.content:
We love looking for consolidation patterns and trading with the trend. One particular candidate that fits these criteria is $COF. Please observe the chart below.

$COF

$COF has been consolidating after a huge move to the upside. With the recent breakout in the financials ETF $XLF, we’re looking for continued upside. We’ll look to get long at a break above yesterday’s high: 89.59. Our stop loss will be a close below 85.24, as we’re expecting the 50MA to hold, but giving ourself some room for noise. And as long as trend holds, we continue holding this long.

If you’re interested in more ideas like this, follow us on Twitter or Facebook to receive our tweets and posts in real time! And if you haven’t yet, subscribe to our email listing below to receive special email alerts as well.
